GapFillDragDrop.Title: Future forms review
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Read the sentences from two conversations where people discuss plans. Unscramble the sentences from each conversation. Drag them onto the correct lines.

Content.Question:
Conversation 1
A When are you planning to move?
B I don’t know. We haven’t sold our flat yet.
A How long do you think it will take?
B I’m not sure, but hopefully we’ll have sold it in a couple of months.
A And will you be buying a new house?
B Not for the moment. I think we’ll rent somewhere to start with.

Conversation 2
A What are you up to later? Are you coming to the restaurant?
B No, I can’t. I’m meeting Shaune this evening.
A Great. What have you got planned?
B I think we’re going to the cinema to see the new Bond film.
A Why don’t you come along afterwards?
B That’s a good idea. The film will have finished by 9.30.
